lines.text: "Have ya paid your dues, Jack?" "Yessir, the check is in the mail."
[last lines]

Just remember what ol' Jack Burton does when the earth quakes, and the poison arrows fall from the sky, and the pillars of Heaven shake. Yeah, Jack Burton just looks that big ol' storm right square in the eye and he says, "Give me your best shot, pal. I can take it."
Okay. You people sit tight, hold the fort and keep the home fires burning. And if we're not back by dawn... call the president.
I'd go with you but...
I know, there's a problem with your face.
I'm a reasonable guy. But, I've just experienced some very unreasonable things.
Everybody relax, I'm here.
Like I told my last wife, I says, "Honey, I never drive faster than I can see. Besides that, it's all in the reflexes."
Here's to the Army and Navy and the battles they have won; here's to America's colors, the colors that never run.
May the wings of liberty never lose a feather.
What's in the flask, Egg? Magic potion?
Yeah.
Thought so, good. What do we do, drink it?
Yeah!
Good! Thought so.
You know what ol' Jack Burton always says at a time like this?
Who?
Jack Burton. *Me*!
You can go off and rule the universe from beyond the grave.
Indeed!
Or check into a psycho ward, which ever comes first, huh?

All I know is, this Lo Pan character comes out of thin air in the middle of a goddamn alley while his buddies are flying around on wires cutting everybody to shreds, and he just stands there waiting for me to drive my truck straight through him with *light* coming out of his mouth!

[speaking to Lo Pan]
Are you crazy... Is that your problem?
Would you stop rubbing your body up against mine, because I can't concentrate when you do that.
God, aren't you even gonna kiss her goodbye?
Nope.
We really shook the pillars of heaven, didn't we, Wang?

[pointing to Chinese writing on elevator]
What does that say?

[speaks Chinese]
Hell of Boiling Oil.
You're kidding.
Yeah, I am. It says Keep Out.
[Jack points to the wall]
Hollow?
Hollow.
Fuck it.
[Jack wacks open the hollow wall with his knife]
Sooner or later I rub everybody the wrong way.

Well, ya see, I'm not saying that I've been everywhere and I've done everything, but I do know it's a pretty amazing planet we live on here, and a man would have to be some kind of FOOL to think we're alone in THIS universe.
Son of a bitch must pay!
Which Lo Pan? Little old basket case on wheels or the ten foot tall roadblock?
We take what we want and leave the rest, just like your salad bar.
You ready, Jack?
I was born ready.
[walking outside in the rain, Jack and Egg fight for control of the umbrella]
A brave man likes the feel of nature on his face, Jack.
Yeah, and a wise man has enough sense to get in out of the rain!
Feel pretty good. I'm not, uh, I'm not scared at all. I just feel kind of... feel kind of invincible.
Me, too. I got a very positive attitude about this.
Good, me too.
Yeah!
[pause]
Is it getting hot in here, or is it just me?
Tall guy, weird clothes. First you see him, then you don't.
That is not water.
Black blood of the earth.
Do you mean oil?
I mean black blood of the earth.
I don't get this at all. I thought Lo Pan...
Shut up, Mr. Burton! You are not brought upon this world to get it!
This is Jack Burton in the Pork Chop Express, and I'm talkin' to whoever's listenin' out there.

[spots Gracie, Margo and Eddie on a security monitor]
Who are these people? Friends of yours, huh? Now this really pisses me off to no end!
Mutual Fidelity Insureres of Sacramento... well there's gotta be a listing honey, cause I pay 'um 6 g's a year in premiums.
China is here Mr. Burton. The Chang Sing, The Wing Kong, they've been fighting for centuries.

What the hell does that mean? huh? China is here, I don't even know what the hell that means, all I know is this "Lo Pan" character comes out of thin air in the middle of a goddamn alley while his buddies are flying around on wires cutting everybody to shreds, and he just stands there waiting for me to drive my truck straight through him, with light coming out of his mouth!
Jack please...
[lightning strikes and Wang becomes silent]
WHAT HAPPENED!
He didnt uncle Chu, not like he says.

[diverting from his phone call]
Sure did uncle Chu, 2 hours ago, Tall guy Weird clothes, first you see him then you don't.
[back to his call]
yeah, is this just a switch board or something...
Lo Pan appeared on the street? Wang Chi why didn't you tell me?
We didn't want to alarm you uncle.

[on his phone call]
I'm gonna tell you about an accident and I dont want to hear an act of god alright.
[enter Eddie]
Good Afternoon Mr. Wong
Eddie, meet my dear friend Jack Burton. Jack, Eddie is the new maitre'd here at the Black Pool.
And a whole lot more.

[on his phone call]
I don't know my policy number, it's in the glove compartment, just look under B.U.R.T.O.N. alright.
Jack Burton?
[Jack turns to his name being called]
Wow, the guy you always told me about huh? So that was your abandon truck.
Yeah, abandon like hell.
[to the phone]
Hey! Hello! Hello! AAHHH Christ.
Bad news. The Lords of Death stole it after you ran away.
They stole my truck?
It's ok Jack, you're with friend, we'll find it for you.
You're Goddamn right your gonna help me find it, and my money, and time is money to a guy lik me...
[points to uncle Chu]
... and your phone is dead by the way.
This is gonna take crackerjack timing, Wang.
Ol' Jack always says... what the hell?
[in a whore house]
Henry Swanson's my name, and excitement's my game.
Cash or charge?
Oh gosh, cash, I guess. I mean it's not deductible, is it.
What does that mean? Huh? "China is here." I don't even know what the hell that means.
Can see things no one else can see. Do things no one else can do.
Real things?
As real as Lo Pan!
Hey, what more can a guy ask for?
Oh, the six-demon bag!
Terrific, a six-demon bag. Sensational. What's in it, Egg?
Wind, fire, all that kind of thing!
Okay. But if I'm gonna be your attorney, there are a few things that I have to know that, uh, still don't make any sense to me. Like, um, you really believe in magic?
You mean Chinese black magic?
Yes.
Oh, absolutely.
Are you still serious about this? And, uh, monsters and ghosts as well, I suppose?
Oh, sure. And sorcery.
And I suppose that, uh, you expect me to believe in sorcery as well?
Of course!
Why?
Because it's real.
How can I know that, Mr. Shen?
How?
Yes, how? Help me out here. Please, how?
[Shen raises his hands, and a small bolt of lightning jumps between his palms. The lawyer stares, open-mouthed]
See? That was nothing. But that's how it always begins. Very small.
I took something. I can see things no one else can see. Why're you dressed like that?
And when I find her, I will marry her...
Never!
Ching Dai will be appeased, my curse will be lifted!
And you can go on to rule the universe from beyond the grave.
Indeed!
Or check into a psycho ward, whichever comes first, right?
Jack, will you...?
"Jack" what? I'm supposed to buy this shit? 2000 years, he can't find one broad to fit the bill? Come on, Dave, you must be doing something seriously wrong!
There have been others, to be sure. There are always others. But you know, Mr. Burton, the difficulties between men and women. How seldom it works out? Yet we all keep trying, like fools.

[tapping on the walls]
Two, three feet thick, I'll bet. Probably welded shut from the outside, and covered with brick by now!
Don't give up, Jack!
Oh, okay, I won't, Wang! Let's just *chew* our way outta here.
You will come out no more!
What? Huh? What'll come out no more?
Come on.
Dammit!
Oh, my god, no. Please! What is that? Don't tell me!
A guardian. What it sees, Lo Pan knows!
[on phone to insurance company]
I'm gonna tell you about an accident, and I don't wanna hear "act of God"!
This is just so shocking. I mean I must just be so monumentally naive.
You are.
Play your cards right... you live to talk about it!

[Jack starts up the Pork Chop Express]
What was that?
6.9 on the Richter scale!

[on their way to confront Lo Pan]
Do you have a gun, I hope?
I have a knife.
A knife? This guy's twelve feet tall!
Seven. Hey, don't worry, I can handle him.
You never could beat me, Egg Shen.
Is this gonna get ugly, now? Huh? I hope not. Because I thought what we were here, racial differences notwithstanding, was just a couple of old friends. You know, just both of us Californians.
Jack, listen, I need more of your help. I can't pay you today, okay?
Oh, shit.
How can I? I need all my cash for Miao Yin.
And it's gonna cost. She's got green eyes.
Oh no, seriously? Oh, that's an extra to these people. It's like leather bucket seats, it's double the price.

[On phone]
No pathetic excuses! I smell the blood of human beings; find them! Boil them until their flesh falls off. You heard me!
Nothin' or double, Jack.
Well sure it was a war. And anybody that showed up was gonna join Lem Lee in the Hell of Being Cut to Pieces.
Hell of being what?
Chinese have a lot of Hells.
What the hell is Gracie Law doing here?
She can't get enough of me.
Hah! He wishes.
I don't belong to you.
You don't. You belong to Ching Dai. I must sacrifice you. But I love you and I need you.
No!
Here take her. Take the bitch!
Wang, these guys, these Sing Dings...
Chang Sings.
They got enemies?
Wing Kong.
Who wear red turbans?

[sees they're now surrounded by Wing Kong warriors]
Holy SHIT! These guys are animals, Jack!
And now, my beloved disciples. The moment of truth... the needle of love.
What does it mean? Two girls with green eyes. After all these years.
You bastards, unchain me. You're not gonna get away with this. Where's Lo Pan?

[speaks Chinese]
This one has fire as well!
We made it. Holy shit, we made it!
They got this sorta clubhouse thing, you know, where they all hang out.
Sharpen their knives, huh?
I can't ask you to...
Where is it?
Thank you, Jack.
You got a tongue, Dave. Ask her yourself.
There have been others, to be sure. There are always others, are there not? You seem to be one who knows the difficulties between men and women. How seldom it works out.
They have returned. And this time they are not alone. Egg Shen is with them. Little bastard sorcerer has brought them through the Bog of the Dead Trees.
[calling to him telepathically]

Egg Shen... EGG SHEN! You have come a long ways to find me. But it is too late. There are two girls with green eyes, and I will marry them both. And then I will sacrifice Gracie Law to appease my emperor and live out my earthly pleasures with Miao Yin.
[cackles]
That's right, Egg Shen. The best of two worlds!
Lo Pan is down there.
Down where?
Where is the universe?
Abandoned like hell!
Jack, first I gotta go somewhere, Jack.
No, you don't.
Yeah, I do. So how 'bout we meet at my restaurant in a few hours, you know? I pay the money then.
Pay the money now! Where you gotta go?
The airport.
Yeah, right. Over my dead body.
If need be.
Don't panic, it's only me, Gracie Law!
[first lines]
What I'd like to do today is get your version of what happened.
Oh, you mean the truth.
Of course. First, just state your name and your occupation for the record.
Oh, Egg Shen. Bus driver.
If you have problem like that again, just reach for the sky!
Then Ching Dai will be happy and my curse will be lifted!
And go off to rule the universe from beyond the grave.
Indeed!
Or check into a psycho ward, which ever comes first huh!
We're getting close, real close. And now for some more bad news... Ready?

[Yells at Wang in Chinese after growing frustrated with Jack's dismissive attitude]
Mr. Burton, if you have an influence over your youthful friend, you better exert it now. Otherwise, I will have you both brought out to the hell where people are skinned alive it's that simple, understand?

[Leans forward]
Are you crazy, is that your problem?
No, he means it Jack.

[after Wang defeats all the warriors in the warehouse]
Time to go!
That's why the bottle didn't slice. My mind and my spirit are goin' north and south.
Magic... The darkest magic. My soul swims in it... Scattered across time, trapped in the world of formlessness...

[Catches Jack's knife in mid air, pauses to examine it, nodding in approval]
Good knife. Goodbye, Mr. Burton.
[throws it]
[quickly catches knife and throws it back, hitting Lo Pan right between the eyes]
